author: Staff Reporter
text:
Urging the State Government to fulfil their 15-demands, members of Joint Action Committee of Teachers’ Organisation (JACTO) formed a human chain in front of the collectorate here on Saturday.

Pension scheme

They were demanding increase in their salary on par with Central government teachers, scrapping of Contributory Pension Scheme (CPS) and bringing in the old pension scheme and others. They had in the first week of February staged road blocks demanding fulfilment of their demands.

With no announcements made in the interim budget, they held a meeting and decided to intensify their protest.

Secretariat march

They decided to hold human chain on February 20, march towards Secretariat on February 25.

If the government failed to invite them for talks, they threatened to begin indefinite strike from February 26.
title: Teachers threaten indefinite strike from February 26
